title: Coding Bootcamp
post_text: Coding bootcamp is pretty fun and a great way to learn! Definitely sign up if you're given the chance!

title: New Playstation VR!
post_text: The new PSVR seems pretty fun! I wonder how PC VR devs will meet the new expectations.

title: AI Art Blows
post_text: AI Art is pretty bad for digital artists considering it takes their art without permission to learn and create things in their style:/
